audioText: Cet homme inconnu virez curieusement autour de notre maison depuis ce matin.
question: What has this unknown man been doing?
options: Turning curiously around our house since this morning
Walking normally past our house occasionally
Working peacefully in our garden today
Visiting our neighbors for friendly conversation
explanation: The text states 'Cet homme inconnu virez curieusement autour de notre maison depuis ce matin' - This unknown man has been turning curiously around our house since this morning. The adjective 'inconnu' (unknown) and verb 'virez' (turn) describe suspicious behavior around property.
